/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is slightly blurred, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the urban landscape.
